displayName.text: Roberta Feldman at Nest Seekers International NYC

formattedAddress: 505 Park Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Roberta Feldman at Nest Seekers International NYC

adrFormatAddress: 505 Park Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Roberta is amazing! She helped our dreams of ownership come true and was with us every step of the way. We had been casually looking to buy a Manhattan apartment for over a year. We met many realtors along the way. Roberta stood out to us for her knowledge of the market, her knowledge of the unit she was showing at the time, and her sincerity. We kept her card and sought her help a year later when we were ready. And we are so glad to have her help! Among other things, she was instrumental in helping us through our board application and interview. When we had an issue with the bank, she was there with great advice. And we hashed through ideas together for some minor renovations after the purchase. Her ideas turned out excellent. I can't say enough about Roberta and we highly recommend her!!

originalText.text: We have been searching for an apartment for close to a year and happened upon Roberta by accident. It was the best thing ever. As first time homebuyers, we couldn’t ask for anything better. She definitely knows the ins and outs of the business. Roberta was very attentive and listened to our very long list of ‘demands’. She also provided very good and honest advice that definitely helped during various critical decision making times.  She is also highly personable with an engaging personality. Roberta never left any questions unanswered, no matter what time of the day.  She is always on time (if not early) on all our appointments and returned all phone calls and emails literally the second she received them. We never felt neglected or unimportant. Roberta even provided us with a lot of recommendations even after we have closed on the apartment. We would highly recommend Roberta to anyone looking to buy a home. In our opinion, she is hands down the best in the business and if we ever need to find a new place again she will always be our first choice.

originalText.text: Roberta is a star due to her knowledge and expertise. She was our broker when we bought our apartment and was our first and only call when we decided to sell. We could not have asked for a better experience for both transactions and highly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell. She’s also a lot of fun to work with and truly cares about her clients.

We could not have asked for a better experience for both transactions and highly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell. She’s also a lot of fun to work with and truly cares about her clients.

originalText.text: Roberta is a first class real estate agent and a  complete professional. She served as a dual agent representing me in the purchase of a 1 bedroom apartment in Midtown NYC. In addition to being very fair and getting the deal done very quickly and effectively, she also helped me tremendously by providing excellent recommendations for a lawyer and lending officer. Roberta is very energetic and attentive, and also very knowledgeable of the NYC real estate market. She would be the first person I reach out to for representation in future dealings.

originalText.text: Roberta was our agent for both the sale of our old apartment and the purchase of our current apartment.  She is excellent, very professional, and super nice.  She expertly advised us through these two complex transactions.  She made sure to always keep us informed on every development as it happened and very clearly explained to us all our options.  We will definitely reach out to her when we decide to look for a new apartment.
